channel.title: Lack of good RSC servers out...why?
channel.description:
Have people just gave up trying? Only 2 servers out worth playing atm and they both suck pretty hard.
We need a hero...to come out with a server for the people...

item.description:
@Schaffer wrote:

I have a site an web hosting
I’d like to just have a 2015 refresh noobscape v3 or some good source you know.
Message me if interested Non-profit runescape classic server Bring back old school rsc

item.source: Lack of good RSC servers out...why?

item.title: Lack of good RSC servers out...why?
item.dc:creator: @gifix2 gifix2
item.description:
@gifix2 wrote:

Lothy:

And what exactly is a ‘server for the people’? There’s never been consensus on the ideal server.

And there will never be a consensus.
What we need is a proper leader…
Think of the great admins of the past, they had a vision, had the skills, and the leadership. Reines, Stork, etc.
A server run by someone that knows how to develop, has a proper direction he wants to take his server in and will not be corrupted by the community in the process. This is what we need, and what we haven’t had in a long time.

Read full topic
